summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear on November 29, 2021, to testify and produce records in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena specifically demands records related to a student's enrollment at an unspecified school.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which this subpoena is issued to compel testimony and document production.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Subpoena Recipient
events.description: The subpoena commands an unnamed recipient to appear in court to testify and produce documents in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 30, 2021, for an appearance on November 29, 2021, in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The subpoena demands the production of records, including registration paperwork and student files, for a specific student.
The recipient of the subpoena is not named in the provided text.
The case referenced is United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
